field.name: summary
field.value: Invocation types should be cached and shared among proxy implementations

field.name: description
field.value:
Currently for each proxy type we generate complete set of private invocation types for each proxied method. This is wasteful, however, since we often end up generating many virtually identical invocation types, when we generate proxies for similar set of classes/interfaces.
From performance standpoint it would be better to reuse existing invocation types instead of creating new ones.
See the discussion here: http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/browse_thread/thread/974077f849c7be9a
